item.description:
In cooperation with the UMass Democrats, members of our DFA group will go to Holyoke on Saturday to volunteer for Pat Duffy, a progressive Democrat running for city council. Pat addressed our group in August, and spoke at our joint meeting in September.

We'll be doing visibility while Pat and her campaign go door to door. Meet at Pat's house in the morning to pick up signs and find out where to go, or if you can't arrive until later, call Pat at 262-9404

When you RSVP, please leave a comment saying what part of the day you're available, and whether you can get to Holyoke or need a ride.

For more information, see http://duffyforholyok...
item.name: Volunteer day for Pat Duffy
